Title: Longing
Plot: Bette engages in a battle with the chairman of the gallery board who wants to close down the gallery. Alice rekindles her relationship with an ex-girlfriend, despite the objections of her friends. Jenny tries to deny her feelings for Marina, and Dana finally gets a date with Lara.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Christine Anton,  Irene Karas,  Judith Maxie,  Bruce Harwood,  Marion Eisman,  Heidi Iro,  Camille Sullivan,  Audra Ricketts,  Anne Archer,  Julian Sands,  Devon Gummersall
